text.title: Singapore's 'founding father' Lee Kuan Yew dies aged 91
text.head: Singapore's 'founding father' Lee Kuan Yew dies aged 91
Sources

list.item: Rujun Shen, Lee Rou Urn. "Lee Kuan Yew, founding father of modern Singapore, dies at 91" — Reuters , March 23, 2015
"Singapore mourns founding father Lee Kuan Yew" — BBC News Online , March 23, 2015
Ian Johnston. "Lee Kuan Yew dead: Founder of modern Singapore dies aged 91" — The Independent , March 22, 2015
